description: candle +â€Ž berry: the waxy coating on the fruits of several species was traditionally used to make candles.

entries.meaning: Any of the plants in the genus Myrica, containing about 35-50 species of small trees and shrubs in the family Myricaceae, order Fagales, with a wide distribution, including Africa, Asia, Europe, North America and South America.
The fruit of plants in the genus Myrica.
